page.title: 18HOLIDAYS IN GURNARD
page.content: Holiday makers come to Gurnard.They stay in bungalows or tents or caravans at Gurnard Pines.They stay in chalets on the Marsh or in holiday bungalows in Shore Road. There are 44 beach huts on Princes Esplanade and people swim and sail from there.Gurnard Sailing Club welcomes visitors. There is a beach shop and 2 cafes at which to buy food and ice-cream.The beach shop sells trays of tea to take on the beach. Visitors can play putting on the putting green at Princes Esplanade. Shops sell food and newspapers to holiday makers at Gurnard Pines and at the Marsh shop.Some holiday makers shop at Mr.Dow's grocers and greengrocers,but these shops are mostly used by people who live in Gurnard all the year round.
